markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fiendish Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=1390) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 41 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

<title level="2">Fiendish Wings leads to...</title>
[Relentless Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=1396)
name: Fiendish Wings
